content: i designed this to work with 2 jumbo skeins of red heart super saver so it is an affordable pattern option for donating to charity the blanket that started it all was donated to a local woman that gives afghans to local veterans there are 2 files 1 with just the pattern and 1 photo the other file contains photos that might help clarify if you have any questions cayla morris was so kind as to make a video for this design thank you so much cayla https //www youtube com/watch v=o8aykokbic8 http //qualitycrochet4fun blogspot com/2017/10/rainbow-it-all-started-with-square html http //qualitycrochet4fun blogspot com/2016/02/it-all-started-with-square html m=1
